verses.roman:
ācāryera vākya prabhu nā kare laṅghana
rahilā advaita-gṛhe, nā kaila gamana

synonyms: ācāryera vākya—the words of Śrī Advaita Ācārya; prabhu—the Lord; nā kare laṅghana—does not deny; rahilā—remained; advaita-gṛhe—at the house of Advaita Ācārya; nā kaila gamana—did not go immediately.
translation: Caitanya Mahāprabhu never violated the request of Advaita Ācārya; therefore He remained at His home and did not leave immediately for Jagannātha Purī.
